results.title: China tour
results.creator_credit: ACMI, ACMI Digital Storytelling and Si Tuan Lieng
results.brief_description: Si Tuan Lieng and his wife are retirees and have recently made an overseas trip to China. In this story he talks about his life and family, their integration into Australian society since they left Vietnam over 26 years ago and highlights of their holiday in China.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI, ACMI Digital Storytelling and Si Tuan Lieng
results.description: Si Tuan Lieng and his wife are retirees and have recently made an overseas trip to China. In this story he talks about his life and family, their integration into Australian society since they left Vietnam over 26 years ago and highlights of their holiday in China.

results.title: Australia - my chosen home
results.creator_credit: Vinh Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Vinh’s study trip to Australia in 1997 changed his life forever. Hanoi may have been the place of his childhood memories but Australia would turn out to be a part of his life - his true home.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Vinh Nguyen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: About my dad
results.creator_credit: Huong Duy Pham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Like his father, Huong Duy Pham was also a soldier in the South Vietnam Army. But his family connections were to prove too dangerous and Huong eventually escaped by boat and made his way to Australia where he is now living with his wife and three sons. He dedicates this story to his father.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Huong Duy Pham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Like his father, Huong Duy Pham was also a soldier in the South Vietnam Army. But his family connections were to prove too dangerous and Huong eventually escaped by boat and made his way to Australia where he is now living with his wife and three sons. He dedicates this story to his father.

results.title: Western stories: expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description:
Western Stories : Expressions for the Future is an inspirational collection of works from young people who, through their association with the Western Chances program, have been given the opportunity to tell their stories and build their own bridge to the future.
Western Chances was established to ensure that financial hardship does not prevent a young person in Melbourne’s West from achieving their maximum potential in life.
results.title_for_label: Western stories: expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project

Western Chances was established to ensure that financial hardship does not prevent a young person in Melbourne’s West from achieving their maximum potential in life.

results.title: Yodit and I
results.creator_credit: Duaa Mahmoud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A tale of heroic acts of a mother’s quest to return her son safe and sound from the battlefields of East Africa in 1896. This inspiring story of Yodit, now half legend, stays alive as it is passed down from one generation to the next.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Duaa Mahmoud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: A tale of heroic acts of a mother’s quest to return her son safe and sound from the battlefields of East Africa in 1896. This inspiring story of Yodit, now half legend, stays alive as it is passed down from one generation to the next.

results.title: Two worlds: one me
results.creator_credit: Elinor Moshe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Born in Israel during the Gulf War but eventually moving to Australia, Elinor Moshe finds herself caught between two countries, cultures and traditions.

results.title: The Tran family
results.creator_credit: Thuy Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description:
This story is dedicated to Thuy Tran’s father who suddenly found himself raising a family of six young children single-handedly when his wife unexpectedly passed away.
A brief introduction to each member of the Tran family is presented along with a personal tribute from Thuy to her father.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Thuy Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Second reality
results.creator_credit: Stacey Fischer, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Always on the move, changing schools, losing new friends, Stacey Fischer escaped from the real world of loneliness to a world where she could create people who couldn’t leave - a place where she would be safe.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Stacey Fischer, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: A Sad realisation
results.creator_credit: Vivian Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The sight of ugly bare land and the sound of heavy machinery where once stood a forest of trees are all too real for Vivian Tran to block out. Trees cannot protect themselves against being logged. A poignant story.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Vivian Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
